osProfile.customData:
[base64(concat('config system global
 set admin-sport 8443
 end
 config firewall address
 edit Azure_v_PIP
 set allow-routing enable
 set subnet 168.63.129.16/32
 set comment Azure_PIP_used_for_internal_platform_resources
 next
 edit Local_VNET
 set allow-routing enable
 set subnet ', parameters('vnetAddressPrefix'), '
 next 
 end
 config router static
 edit 1
 set gateway ', variables('sn1GatewayIP'), '
 set device port1
 next
 edit 2
 set dstaddr Local_VNET 
 set gateway ', variables('sn2GatewayIP'), '
 set device port2
 next
 edit 3
 set dstaddr Azure_v_PIP
set device port2
 set gateway ', variables ('sn2GatewayIP'), '
 next
edit 4
set dstaddr Azure_v_PIP
set device port1
 set gateway ', variables ('sn1GatewayIP'), '
 next
 end
 config system interface
 edit port1
 set mode static
 set ip ', reference(concat('Microsoft.Network/networkInterfaces/', variables('network_NIC_fg11_Name'))).ipConfigurations[0].properties.privateIPAddress, '/', variables('sn1CIDRmask'), '
 set description external
 append allowaccess probe-response
 next
 edit port2
 set allowaccess probe-response
 set mode static
 set ip ', reference(concat('Microsoft.Network/networkInterfaces/', variables('network_NIC_fg12_Name'))).ipConfigurations[0].properties.privateIPAddress, '/', variables('sn2CIDRmask'), '
 set description internal
 next
 edit port3
 set mode static
 set ip ', reference(concat('Microsoft.Network/networkInterfaces/', variables('network_NIC_fg13_Name'))).ipConfigurations[0].properties.privateIPAddress, '/', variables('sn3CIDRmask'), '
 set description hasyncport
 next
 edit port4
 set mode static
 set ip ', reference(concat('Microsoft.Network/networkInterfaces/', variables('network_NIC_fg14_Name'))).ipConfigurations[0].properties.privateIPAddress, '/', variables('sn4CIDRmask'), '
 set description management
 set allowaccess ping https ssh ftm
 next
 end
 config system probe-response
 set http-probe-value OK
 set mode http-probe
 end
 config system ha
 set group-name AzureHA
 set mode a-p
 set hbdev port3 100
 set session-pickup enable
 set session-pickup-connectionless enable
 set ha-mgmt-status enable
 config ha-mgmt-interfaces
 edit 1
 set interface port4
 set gateway ', variables('sn4GatewayIP'),'
 next
 end
 set override disable
 set priority 200
 set unicast-hb enable
 set unicast-hb-peerip ', reference(concat('Microsoft.Network/networkInterfaces/', variables('network_NIC_fg23_Name'))).ipConfigurations[0].properties.privateIPAddress, '
 end'))]
